oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Drama -- Lebanon
Lebanese actors
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Qubqab, the wooden clog or wooden shoes . A play. Starring Antoine Kerbage. Written by Antoine Ghandour. Starting from February 8, 1979, at Hotel Alexander, Casino of Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The wooden clog
